title: Missions are not working
body:
Why are none of my missions getting completed?  Does ARURF not count?


Update: My missions have worked today. NONE of my progress I should have made yesterday has been tracked.

replies.body: also u cant complete (first win of the day) too

The first missions are going to time out in 3 hours. Should we play now, trusting that it will be counted later, or will it not be counted anyways? Will riot extend the timeouts to make up for bugginess?

> [{quoted}](name=IllTakeMyRivenge,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xx2iYivj,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-06-30T11:51:56.060+0000)
>
> The first missions are going to time out in 3 hours. Should we play now, trusting that it will be counted later, or will it not be counted anyways? Will riot extend the timeouts to make up for bugginess?

No idea, I just hope they count the missions as completed.

Same, I tried in ARURF and PvP and I should have accomplished some of my missions but 0 progress... this bug is really annoying, I hope they will fix it asap because I want to do the event's missions...

> [{quoted}](name=JadenTheMagician,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xx2iYivj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-30T10:43:04.779+0000)
>
> Same, I tried in ARURF and PvP and I should have accomplished some of my missions but 0 progress... this bug is really annoying, I hope they will fix it asap because I want to do the event's missions...

I just hope they complete the missions we finished while the bug was active, so we don't have to do them again.
RIOT is a small indie game dev, give them  a break guys Kappa

This is a joke... right?  Over 2000 employees is a pretty significant size for a game company.  I understand things happen, but the core system to an event breaking down, preventing people from knowing what they should be focusing on is pretty serious.  It's like forgetting the football and telling the players to just imagine there's a ball and act accordingly.  Funny to watch and you can still have fun, but it's no way to conduct something with prizes at stake.

They act like a small indi company with how they 

Balance their game
Keep things working
Test new changes

(Flashes back to Clash)
Yeah, no
Can Riot please for the love of god at least give us a proper ETA for resolution?
Even if they don't have one? I personally would rather not be told something that isn't close.

> [{quoted}](name=TheRealJJ,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xx2iYivj,comment-id=004c0000,timestamp=2018-06-30T23:07:19.829+0000)
>
> Even if they don't have one? I personally would rather not be told something that isn't close.

I'd still prefer to know, if it wouldn't be close. If i knew it's going to take so long i wouldn't do so much shit to kill time just waiting for 1 mission (pathetic i know but i really wanted to open the orb the whole day)

https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na

Short version, they're aware of the problem and match records are being kept.

Can Riot at least address some of the questions we have.. Like will our progress now still count? Or are we playing just for the sake of it? Mission time is passing by and we are stuck.. We demand answers Rito!!!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I just want to serve in the name of the one true king of the rift. {{sticker:garen-swing}}
**_HA!_** {{sticker:darius-angry}}

This is so frustrating, I’m grinding missions for skins and trying to get Ornn I waited a de hours and come back to no response...please riot help. I’m not trying to be disrespectful but recently it’s like every event you guys run issues happen.. and what about the competition! How will we know a fair winner
It's been 10 hours already!!! I'm not planning to play all day so I just hope they take into account the games we did so far...

Ditto on the Mission logs not updating.  Kings Peace Day 4 and Roar of Demacia (5/10) are not updating.  Additionally, my match history page is now no longer functional.  I notice that of the posts I see here, none of them mention Darius missions and the first and second days Garren was the one winning so I'd be curious to find out if it's related to the faction we selected or if the people who selected Darius are just not posting the mission names their progress is stuck on.
Hey bud, I sided with Darius and am having the same issue with the missions not updating, so we're in this together :3 Call of war day 4, and Howl of Noxus 5/10 in case anyone was curious.
I think the problem started today cause i finished all my Howl of Noxus missions yesterday but my call of war today isnt updating
I have the same problem since this morning, no mission is progressing, I got a new one a few minutes ago and thought it was unstucked, but it doesn't progress either. I cannot complete them...

I didn't get anything, not even first win of the day after winning in ARAM just few minutes ago, no progression in a quest that was already progressing from ARAM matches and no completition of a quest that just required your team to get FB (which happened).
Still not working.  Can we get a word from a red?
Mission for DAY 6 is not working... "win an aram game"... won an aram game... still have to win an Aram game... thank you
Missions are up !

> [{quoted}](name=the Anarchit3cht,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xx2iYivj,comment-id=0067,timestamp=2018-07-01T06:43:10.876+0000)
>
> Missions are up !

But none of the progress we made yesterday was saved.
seriously are the missions up
Yes, but progress was not saved as indicated.
Glad to see that none of the progress saved when the missions were down. I don't care, just don't lie to us Rito...
NO WAY RIOT HAS AN EVENT THAT DOESNT WORK, THE WORLD MUST ME ENDING... or its just another day for lol
come on guys I need to complete these missions for my bae T-T{{sticker:darius-angry}}
I just realized even op.gg isn't working. I tried to refresh and it had an error message.
can confirm none of my missions are being completed since this morning
Compensation Please :) {{sticker:draven-pose}}
If we miss missions thanks to this I swear Riot better begin compensating for wasted time.

I'm glad we upgraded to this new Client that still breaks down and create's some type of Error every single Event yall ever do lmfao, my patience is really being strained with Riot.

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
Still not working. No progress on minion kills or getting kills/assists
Is this even being fixed because it has been over 12 hours....
I can't complete any of my misions lol. Hope my progress is still being tracked. I don't want to start them all over.
I've tried every game mode. None of them are progressing the missions.

Mine too, I just tried to finish - The call of war (day 4) - 3 times, both on Arurf and normal..  I see that you guys have the same problems with missions.. I hope riot does something about that asap, cuz everyone wants to get their missions done..
{{sticker:darius-angry}}

Any updates from Rito on this? Some form of update would be nice... I want to play, but I haven't due to bugs and not sure how this will affect the quests post fix...
{{sticker:sg-zephyr}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Riot, do you want to do something good with this game or you want to lose LoL players? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
LOL they are working on it im sure. Its not like the game it self isn't working.
Riot needs to fix this ASAP. I WANT MY FIRST WIN EXP NOWWWW
Is riot going to bother fixing this? its on every server
Missions seem very hit and miss today. First game seemed to work, it hasn't after that
plzzz riot i do something about my missions plzzzzzzzzz...i beg of u or i wont get my reward for VS events plzzzzzzzz...RIOT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{sticker:sg-janna}}
I just won an ARAM with 30 minutes left on the first mission. None of my mission updated with the games stats. Even the one that has win an ARAM as the condition.
